metadata.title: [Invectives contre la secte de vauderie]
metadata.creator: Tinctor, Johann, approximately 1405-1469
metadata.subject: Witchcraft
Demonology
Magic
metadata.description: A Middle French translation of the author's treatise: Sermo contra sectam Vaudensium
Illuminated initials and line-fillers in rose, blue, white and gold
Bound in velvet with silver bosses and cornerpieces; clasps broken
First 4 and last 7 leaves blank; at least 2 leaves torn off
Vol. begins: Le prologue de cest euure parle des matieres qui sensuiuent. Premier de la creation des angeles. Item du pechie des angeles en general et de leur punition
Described in: Canada collects Middle Ages
University of Alberta copy bears inscription on front flyleaf: Capel Leigh 1798
University of Alberta copy a gift of Dr. John Lunn
